What Else You Need to Know: The Rose Quartz Gua Sha tool glides across skin, promoting lymphatic drainage to improve appearance of elasticity of the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines. With gently applied pressure, the tool helps relieve tension and aids the absorption of skincare products on the skin's surface.
